column2: the place was packed with people standing around the entrance
column3: waiting to be seated. When we signed in to get a table
column4: they told us we can preorder our pizza. We ordered the Malnati chicago classic
column5: which is the deep dish with sausage and cheese. We waited 50 min to get a table. So when we got our table
column6: we thought that since we preordered our pizza 45 min ago
column7: it would be ready. But we waited another 45 min while sitting at the table before the pizza came. At first i was excited to finally try the famous chicago deep dish pizza. I love cheese. I was just hungry so first few bites
column9: it's like chewy cheese on hard crust. The atmosphere is interesting inside the restaurant. Sports jerseys of famous players were framed on the walls.
